17:43

INTSINZI BANA B'U RWANDA niyo ntero muri stade Huye

Abasaga ibihumbi birindwi by'abanyarwanda bari muri stade bahagurukiye rimwe baririmba intsinzi bana b'u Rwanda ya Mariya Yohana. MVS ikomeje mu cyiciro cya gatatu cya CAF Confederation Cup isezereye Al Hilal SC Al Obayed kuri penaliti 5-4 kuko imikino yombi banganyije 0-0.

17:37

Penaliti ya gatanu ya MVS

Ndayishimiye Christopher arayinjije. Mukura VS ikomeje mu cyiciro gikurikiraho.

17:36

Penaliti ya gatanu ya Al Hilal SC Al Obayed

Abdelahman Hassan arayinjije

17:36

Penaliti ya kane ya MVS

Twizerimana Onesme arayinjije nawe ariko umunyezamu Ahmed Mohamed ayikoraho umupira uranga ujyamo

17:34

Penaliti ya kane ya Al Hilal SC Al Obayed

Musa Idris Teya arayinjije

17:33

Penaliti ya gatatu ya MVS

Ndizeye Innocent bita Kigeme, umuhungu w'i Nyamagabe arayinjije nawe

17:33

Penaliti ya gatatu ya Al Hilal SC Al Obayed

Omer Suliman arayinjije

17:32

Penaliti ya kabiri ya MVS

Iddy Saidi Djuma ataye penaliti nziza ikubita ku giti cy'izamu yijyanamo. Ibyishimo by'abanyarwanda ni byose

17:31

Penaliti ya kabiri ya Al Hilal SC Al Obayed

Yousuf Ibrahim ayiteye ku giti cy'izamu. Amahirwe ya Mukura VS ariyongereye

17:30

Penaliti ya mbere ya MVS

Umurundi Gael Duhayindavyi nawe arayinjije. Abafana mu bicu

17:29

Penaliti ya mbere ni iya Al Hilal SC Al Obayed

Mohamed Tahir winjiye mu kibuga asimbuye arayinjije

17:27

Ubwoba ni bwose ku banyarwanda bashyigikiye Mukura VS

Abakinnyi bose ba Mukura VS bagaragiye umunyezamu Rwabugiri Omar bamwinginga ngo abafashe akuremo penaliti

17:23

Umukino urarangiye hagiye kwitabazwa Penaliti

17:22

Agafoto kâ€™urwibutso i Huye ntikabagwa nabi!

17:22

Iminota itatu y'inyongera ku mukino

Iminota 90 y'umukino irangiye amakipe yombi anganya. Hongeweho iminota itatu y'inyongera. Nirangira haritabazwa za Penaliti

17:20

90' Ikarita y'umuhondo ya mbere y'umukino

Saidi Iragire abaye umukinnyi wa mbere uhawe ikarita y'umuhondo ku ikosa akoreye rutahizamu Teya

17:19

86' Gusimbuza ku ruhande rwa MVS

Gusatira niyo ntego. Umutoza wa Mukura VS akuyemo myugariro w'iburyo Rugirayabo Hassan aha umwanya Ndizeye Innocent usanzwe ukina ari rutahizamu

17:18

Umukinnyi wa Al Hilal SC Al Obayed akoze impanuka mu kibuga

Myugariro Maki Moaiad asimbukiye umupira mu kirere agongana na Mutijima Janvier amanutse akubita umutwe hasi. Ari kwitabwaho n'abaganga

17:13

81' Gusimbuza ku ruhande rwa Mukura VS

Bertrand Iradukunda wagaragazaga umunaniro asimbijwe Iddy Saidi Djuma abakinnyi bombi bakina ku mpande basatira

17:10

78' Gusimbuza ku ruhande rwa Al Hilal SC Al Obayed

Abdelahim Gezala asimbuwe na Mohaned Abbas. Umukinnyi wo hagati asimbuwe na myugariro. Ikipe ya Al Hilal SC Al Obayed ikomeje intego zo kurinda izamu. Umukino nurangira amakipe yombi anganya 0-0 haritabazwa penaliti

17:10

Imibare itangiye kuba myinshi ku batoza bombi

17:07

73' Abakinnyi bane ba Mukura VS bagiye kwishyushya

Umutoza Haringingo Francis ahagurukije abakinnyi bane ngo bajye kwishyushya barimo; Iddy Saidi Djuma, Basir Hatungimana, Innocent Ndizeye bita Kigeme. Aba bari kumwe n'umunyezamu wa kabiri Ingabire Aimee Regis uzwiho gukuramo penaliti.

17:03

70' Koruneri ya Al Hilal SC Al Obayed

Abakunzi ba MVS bari muri stade Huye bari batewe ubwoba na Koruneri ya Al Hilal SC Al Obayed ibonetse ku mupira urengejwe na Iragire Saidi ariko Abdelhim ayiteye ku kaguru ka Rugirayabo umupira awusubiza imbere

17:03

Ni umukino w'imbaraga no guhangana ku mpande zombi

16:57

65' Kabuhariwe wa Al Hilal SC Al Obayed arasimbujwe

Umukinnyi usanzwe ubanza mu kibuga mu ikipe y'igihugu ya Sudani Mudather El Taib utigaragaje cyane asimbujwe Abdelrahim Hassan

16:55

62' Christopher Ndayishimiye ahushije igitego ari wenyine imbere y'izamu

Ciza Hussein Mugabo ahinduye umupira ku ruhande rw'iburyo usanga Bertrand Iradukunda imbere y'izamu aratuza ntiyahita atera ishoti mu izamu aha mugenzi we Christopher Ndayishimiye wari wenyine imbere y'izamu ariko atera ku ruhande.

16:44

54' Amakosa ya Ciza Hussein yari atsindishije Mukura VS igitego

Kapiteni Ciza Hussein atakaje umupira ufatwa na Mudather acanga Rugirayabo ahindura umupira mwiza ashaka rutahizamu Musa Teya ariko atera hejuru y'izamu rya Rwabugiri

16:42

52' Myugariro wa Hilal yari yitsinze

Gael Duhayindavyi azamukanye umupira hagati mu kibuga awucomekera Bertrand Iradukunda na Onesme bari mu rubuga rw'amahina myugariro Ahmed Ibrahim aratabara ashaka kuwurenza umupira uranga unyura ku murongo w'izamu benshi bari muri stade Huye baketse ko yitsinze ariko umupira ujya muri Koruneri itagize icyo itanga

16:34

Igice cya kabiri cy'umukino gitangiranye gusimbuza ku ruhande rwa Mukura VS

Umutoza Haringingo Francis akoze impinduka, akuramo Lomami Frank yinjiza Onesme Twizerimana agamije gushaka igitego mu gice cya kabiri gitangijwe na Al Hilal SC Al Obayed

16:19

Igice cya mbere kirarangiye

Umusifuzi ukomoka muri Eswatini ahushye mu ifirimbi arangiza igice cya mbere cyaranzwe no gukinira hagati ku mpande zombi

16:17

Umunota umwe w'inyongera ku gice cya mbere

Iminota 45 ya mbere y'umukino irangiye nta kipe irareba mu izamu ry'indi. Nta n'uburyo bukomeye cyane bwabonetse muri iki gice cya mbere cyongeweho umunota umwe ngo kirangire

16:15

42' Impinduka mu buryo bw'imikinire ya Mukura VS

Batangiye umukino Lomami Frank ariwe ukina nka rutahizamu agaragiwe na Bertrand Iradukunda uca ibumoso na Ciza uca iburyo none habayeho impinduka Bertrand Iradukunda aba ariwe ukina nka rutahizamu, Lomami aca ibumoso

16:12

38' Omer Suliman wavunitse ashobora gusimbuzwa

Myugariro wo mu mutima wa Al Hilal SC Al Obayed, Omer Suliman agonganye na Ndayishimiye Christopher ababara mu itako none ari kwitabwaho n'abaganga ari nako Abdelhaman Hassan ushobora kumusimbura atangira kwishyushya

16:03

30' Ishoti rikomeye rya Duhayindavyi

Umurundi Gael Duhayindavyi atunguye umunyezamu Mohammed ariko yitwara neza akuramo umupira. Mukura VS ikomeje gusatira ishaka igitego mu gice cya mbere

15:59

25' Umutoza Frank Nutal wa Hilal ntabwo yishimiye imyitwarire y'abakinnyi be

Umutoza ukomoka muri Ecosse akomeje gusaba abakinnyi be kwirinda ko Hassan Rugirayabo azamuka akabahindurana imipira igana ku izamu ivuye ku ruhande rw'iburyo kuko niho ibitego byinshi bya Mukura VS biva

15:55

23' Umukino ubaye uhagaze

Gael Duhayindavyi na Hassan ukina hagati mu kibuga muri iyi kipe yo muri Sudani bagonganiye hagati mu kibuga ubwo Al Hilal SC Al Obayed yageragezaga cotre attaque ariko bose barababara bajyanywe hanze kwitabwaho n'abaganga

15:52

20' Al Hilal SC Al Obayed yahisemo gukina icungira kuri 'contre attaque'

Mukura VS ikomeje gusatira igerageza uburyo bwinshi bushobora kubyara igitego bikanga ariko ikipe ya Al Hilal SC Al Obayed yo iracyakina yugarira cyane yiga uwo bahanganye inakoresha contre attaque kuko ifite abakinnyi barebare bakina mu mpande banihuta

15:48

15' Kutumvikana kuri ba rutahizamu ba Mukura VS bitabaye Al Hilal SC Al Obayed

Umupira uzamukanywe neza na Mutijima Janvier aha umupira Bertrand Iradukunda waciye ku ruhande rw'ibumoso agera imbere y'izamu ariko agongana na Lomami Frank bombi bifuza gutsinda ariko kutumvikana kwabo biha amahirwe ba myugariro ba Hilal babambura umupira

15:43

10' Coup franc ya Mukura VS ntacyo ibyaye

Tahel akoreye ikosa Christopher Ndayishimiye haboneka umupira uteretse washoboraga kwerekezwa mu izamu ariko Ciza Hussein agerageza kuwutera ku mutwe wa Nshirimana David birangira ba myugariro ba Hilal bamusumbye

15:40

07' Ciza Hussein Mugabo yihanijwe n'umusifuzi

Nyuma yo kugerageza gutera mu izamu umupira ukagarurwa na Omer Suliman umugarukiye ashaka kugwa ariko umusifuzi amubwira ko niyongera kwigwisha ashobora guhabwa ikarita y'umuhondo

15:39

Abafana bitabiriye ku bwinshi!

15:37

05' Hilal ifite abakinnyi b'ibigango ku maso

Ikipe ya Al Hilal SC Al Obayed yiganjemo abakinnyi b'ibigango iri gukina imipira miremire ariko Mukura VS yo imaze kugera ku izamu ryayo inshuro ebyiri ikoresheje umupira wo hasi kandi wihuta

15:37

Uyu munsi Mukura ntiteze kuzawibagirwa mu mateka!

15:35

Amafoto y'abasore ba Al Hilal SC Al Obayed bari kwishyushya

15:32

Umusifuzi Thulani Zibandze atangije umukino

Ikipe ya Mukura VS itangiye umukino isatira cyane. Lomami Frank uwutangije ahaye Rugirayabo Hassan wirukanse ku ruhande rw'iburyo ahindura umupira ashaka ba rutahizamu barimo Christopher ariko ahusha igitego

15:29

Imbangukiragutabara nazo zirahari!

15:29

Umuyobozi wa FERWAFA nawe arahageze

Brig Gen Sekamana Jean Damascene uyobora ishyirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru mu Rwanda nawe yinjiye muri iyi stade Huye aho aje gushyigikira Mukura VS ngo ikore amateka kuko nishobora gusezerera Hilal El Obeid iraba isigaje icyiciro kimwe gusa mbere yo kwinjira mu matsinda y'iri rushanwa, yaba ikipe ya kabiri mu Rwanda ibikoze nyuma ya Rayon Sports yabikoze uyu mwaka 2018

15:29

Abakinnyi 11 bagiye kubanza mu kibuga ku mpade zombi

Mukura VS

Umunyezamu: Omar Rwabugiri,
Ba myugariro: Rugirayabo Hassan, Nshimirimana David, Iragire Saidi na Mutijima Janvier
Abakina hagati: Gael Duhayindavyi, Munyakazi Yussuf Lule, Ciza Hussein Mugabo (C)
Ba rutahizamu: Ndayishimiye Christopher, Bertrand Iradukunda na Lomami Frank


Hilal El Obeid FC:


Ahmed Abdelazim, Omer Suliman, Rahim Gezalla, Ali Omer, Elhami Ahmed, Mudather Al Taib, Musa Idris Teya, Youssuf Ibrahim, Moaiad Maki, Mofadal Hassan (C), Ahmed Elnour

15:27

Amakipe yombi asohotse mu rwambariro rugiye kwambikana

Mukura VS mu mabara yayo asanzwe y'umuhondo n'umukara na Al Hilal SC Al Obayed yambaye imyenda y'Ubururu n'Umweru bageze mu kibuga bitegura gutangira umukino

15:26

Umuhondo ni ryo bara i Huye

15:25

Abakinnyi ba Mukura VS biteguye kwandika amateka, bageze kuri Stade bafite akanyamuneza ku maso

15:24

Polisi yâ€™u Rwanda irahabaye kugira ngo umutekano ukomeze kwizerwa

15:23

Abasore ba Hilal El Obeid ubwo bageraga ku kibuga

15:19

Ambasaderi wa Sudani mu Rwanda yaherekeje abenegihugu be

15:18

Umukino ugiye kuyoborwa n'abasifuzi bakomoka muri Eswatini


Thulani Zibandze, Sifiso Nximulo, Zamani Thulani na Mbogiseni Eliot nibo basifuzi bâ€™uyu mukino

15:17

Mukura VS ifite amahirwe yo gukomeza


Umukino ubanza wahuje Mukura VS na Hilal El Obeid wabereye i Obeid muri Sudani warangiye amakipe yombi anganya 0-0. Bivuga ko intsinzi ya MVS iyo ariyo yose ishobora kuraza abanyarwanda mu birori.

15:14

Twageze kuri Stade ya Huye ku mbehe ya Mukura VS

Hagiye kubera Umukino wo kwishyura w'ijonjora rya kabiri ry'igikombe gihuza amakipe yatwaye ibikombe by'ibihugu iwayo 'CAF confederation Cup'
